entry.title: Stable Release V1.8.2
entry.content: We are happy to announce the V1.8.2 bugfix point release of Black Magic Debug.
entry.summary: We are happy to announce the V1.8.2 bugfix point release of Black Magic Debug.

entry.title: Stable Release V1.8.1
entry.content: We are happy to announce the V1.8.1 bugfix point release of Black Magic Debug.
entry.summary: We are happy to announce the V1.8.1 bugfix point release of Black Magic Debug.

entry.title: Stable Release V1.8.0
entry.content: We are happy to announce the V1.8.0 release of Black Magic Debug. It is a big one since we did not make a stable release since October 2020!!! So this release is very much overdue. But that also means we have a lot of new and interesting things in this release.
entry.summary: We are happy to announce the V1.8.0 release of Black Magic Debug. It is a big one since we did not make a stable release since October 2020!!! So this release is very much overdue. But that also means we have a lot of new and interesting things in this release.

entry.title: GitHub Organization Name Change
entry.content: Hey everyone! As announced in the “New Maintainer” post we have now renamed the github organization from blacksphere to blackmagic-debug.
entry.summary: Hey everyone! As announced in the “New Maintainer” post we have now renamed the github organization from blacksphere to blackmagic-debug.

entry.title: New Project Maintainer
entry.content: Hi everyone! As some of you might know this project was created and maintained for many years by Gareth McMullin. He has created a wonderful tool that we all use and love. You might have also noticed that Gareth did not have much time to dedicate to the project for the last few years. He asked me a while ago if I would be able to take over the project and become an official maintainer of Black Magic Debug. I did not have the necessary resources to dedicate to the project until very recently. But it is finally time, from now on I am officially taking on the position as the Black Magic Debug maintainer. :slight_smile:
